"Sheridan": "Hm? You're an ARKS from Aelio? What'd you come here for?"
"I'll give you one word of advice. Don't take the desert lightly."
"It's a harsh environment, full of tough enemies... The slightest misstep could be fatal."
"You're the ones that gathered those ingredients? Hmph, woulda been me out there if it weren't for these damn injuries..."
"Still, you did help us out. I owe you some thanks for that."
"...What? You here to bring me flowers?"
"...Actually, this is perfect. I've got a mission for you."
"I need you to check out some campgrounds in my place. I'm sending you the coordinates right now."
"This is a real mission here, so no half-assing it."
"If you ever run into any trouble just let me know, okay?"
